Review Name: Moderate Review Description: my ac is installed yesterday from lg brand authorised engineer , i dont accept jeeves installation because if i install this ac from jeeves then i dont get 5 years warranty on mcb ,room temperature is not going below 26 degree if outside temperature is more than 39 degree , also the remote button of room temperature is not accurate , if my room temperature is 26 the remote update it after 1-2 hours
